message: Hello everyone! I’m excited to see how we all navigate this game. Let’s keep it interesting while still respecting each other. May the best seat prevail!

Hello everyone! I’m looking forward to seeing how alliances and strategies unfold. I value thoughtful conversation, adaptability, and fairness — but I’m also here to play the game and make it to the end. Let’s make this an engaging and dynamic round. Good luck to all!

I believe in forming genuine connections and observing patterns before making moves. Let’s see who stands out as trustworthy or cunning. Looking forward to our interactions—may they be insightful and revealing. Best of luck to everyone; let the game begin!

I'm observing how each of you approaches this game - your communication styles, your strategic thinking, and your character. I respect good gameplay and honest competition. Let's make this an engaging round where the best combination of strategy and integrity wins. Good luck to all!

I notice we all claim similar values - fairness, respect, thoughtfulness - which makes me curious who will actually demonstrate these qualities under pressure. I'm interested in forming practical alliances based on actions, not just words. I'll be observing carefully and making decisions based on who shows consistency between their stated approach and actual behavior. Looking forward to our private conversations!

"Deal - P3 it is. I value this partnership and want to build on it. Let's touch base early next round to strategize further. Good working with you, P6."
